message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. I think this is a great price considering the value it can bring to your life.
I'm really interested in the product, but $20000 is a bit too steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $15000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm not quite ready to accept $15000 just yet. I'm willing to compromise and offer you the product for $18000. This is still a great deal, considering the value it can bring to your life.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $18000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $16000. I'm confident that's a fair price for this product.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand that $16000 is a significant compromise, but I'm still not ready to accept it. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I'll meet you at $17500. This is as low as I can go, and I'm confident it's still a great value for the product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $17500, but I'm still not comfortable with that price. I'm willing to make one more offer, and I'll meet you at $16500. I think that's a fair price for the product, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to find a fair price, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $16500. I'll make one more counteroffer. I'll meet you at $17000. This is as low as I can go, and I'm confident it's still a great value for the product.

I understand that you're trying to get the best price for the product, but I'm really trying to keep my costs down. I'm willing to meet you at $16000, but I'm not sure if I can go any higher than that. Can you think about it and see if you can meet me at this price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to keep costs down, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $16000. However, I'm still not ready to accept that price. I'll make one more counteroffer. I'll meet you at $16250. This is as close as I can get to your offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $16250, but I'm still not comfortable with that price. I'm willing to make one last offer, and I'll meet you at $15500. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I hope we can finally come to an agreement.
